text: Khawalaiya mi ngai karra akadikmak pathian chongkachoi ngaikha inlei-inlar, halli hiwa hile in-ang rip-ah akatuunmak ocha ngai'n nangni karra inlahong inlarsik eii. Inmani'n kakatanpa Karu kha hongzootnunu, halli inmani'n mangnasik ka-eii katuunmak minchuna kha laheichoi inta, inmanitak chungnga jetlei theileiya mangna kha inlaheichoi sik eii.
